column5: I'm supposed to be heading to North Bay for a conference next week, and I'm curious as to what your weather report is for the week. How much snow do you have as this will determine what kind of clothes and footwear to pack?
Roy, if you don't know, just say so.
Thats it Roy,dont take no crap off of him.
No snow here at this time. Supposed to cool off next week but not sure of precipitation. Im only looking at temps cause I want the ice on the lake GONE !!!
It seems like my question set off a row, sorry I asked!
Believe it or not grt1, it was all in jest.
they are calling for rain mon and tue then cooling off wed so far
Not at all. Doug and I have been friends for years. You have yourself a great conference in North Bay. Get some fishing in if you can.
No worries, grt1, 'tis all in fun.  Not all of my friends are nutbars, btw.  I think I'm finding a pattern tho.   Short + French + furry =
